column1: Smoque BBQ////-Food was awesome.  Loved the chopped brisket (little drier than sliced
column2: but no giant pieces of fat) and the pulled pork.  Cornbread was the best I have had since moving here from the Carolinas.  Mac and Cheese was great - rich
column3: and has a bread crumb and cheddar topping.  Beans were okay - too much onion for our taste.  And were mayo base slaw fans - so hated the slaw.  fries were huge and hot
